original_text: For Zion's sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem's sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth.
korean_text: 나는 시온의 의가 빛 같이, 예루살렘의 구원이 횃불 같이 나타나도록 시온을 위하여 잠잠하지 아니하며 예루살렘을 위하여 쉬지 아니할 것인즉

sentences.original_text: For Zion's sake will I not hold my peace
and for Jerusalem's sake I will not rest
until righteousness thereof go forth as brightness
and salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth
